description: Students develop the skills to translate business concepts into practical financial models using Microsoft Excel. They gain a strong foundation in fundamental Excel functions, formulas, and techniques, and learn how to apply them to real-world business scenarios. The course provides aptitudes that are important for upper-level business courses, as well as internships. Offered annually. Prerequisite: sophomore standing or above, or permission of instructor.
name: Business Modeling in Excel
notes: Not open to first year students.
prerequisites: sophomore standing or above, or permission of instructor.
